review:
We visited because my daughter was having cold and cough this time .
Though we visit regularly for any pediatrics issue and we are happy with the treatment till now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Nice doctor. raghav is felling better  now.thanku  so much doctor.i hope you treatment  is always helpful for raghav

Very bad experience. Had to take immediate appointment at 7:30 pm and we got late by 15 mins due to Sarjapur Road jam but he responded very rudely. Doesn’t listen to issues *** ******** ********. Had to take another appointment with other doctor. Advise to avoid taking appointment unless you don’t find anyone in the emergency.

Tellis always talks the extreme case. This happened two times with me so only writing feedback. 

My son got fever because of weather change.  Symptoms were mild fever and cold. But he went in to covid scenarios.

Similar incident was when i took my daughter who was having  wheezing because of cold. He went in to asthma attack.

** **** **** **** *** * **** ** ****** ** *****

It was my second visit. Being a senior doctor he should understand the concerns of parents. A kid of 3 years is suffering from mild fever occasionally. Reason given was low immunity. Now listen the examples given by Dr. Tellis . This kind of problem can be in cancer, HIV+ or tuberculosis. Sir you may not be having sense of how much these words can scare a parents. I will never recommend anyone to visit Mr Tellis until he is the last doctor on earth.

No receptionist, no power in the hospital, no nurse, they don't have vaccination in-house and patient has to go down to medical to get it, parents have to hold the child as they don't have a nurse, no hand gloves during vaccination - YET, they charge Rs.500/- what is so great about this hospital and its hospitality?? I do not recommend this to anyone. - Abhishek.
reply_text: Sorry for the inconvenience . Apologies for the poor infrastructure at this clinic. I have  reduced my consulting here. That said, the charges are for Consultation and the vaccination process.

review:
The doctor is good but was not happy with last consultation as he is walking outside and there was a lot of disturbance. We are paying 750 rs for the consultation and it's not fair **** *** ****** ** ******** ****** * ****** ***** *********** There was too much disturbance due to traffic and half of the time I couldn't hear what he was saying.
********** ** ***** ****** ** **** *******
He is the doctor for my kid more than 1.5 yrs now and tenure was totally satisfactory. We are confident for his treatments.
Very experienced doctor. We are visiting him since last 4 years. ** ** *** **** ** **** ** ***** We are happy with the service he provided.
****** *** ***** Had the worst experience. ** ***** ***** **** *** * ***** *** ** *** ******* ***** ** **** I didn't even buy the Medicine just dropped the prescription in dust bin.

review: Doctor was available late at night when we needed the most. He promptly called at the scheduled time. He gave good explanation of what to do and take care of and what not to worry about. Also the prescription has very few medicines. Thanks a lot!
Very good explanation  of the problem and the best treatment given....  thank you very much doctor....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Have been going to him for my kids for the past so many years. ********* ********* ***** ***** Very comfortable taking my kids to him.
reply_text: Thanks for the kind words . Much appreciated .

review: Have taken my 3 year old to Dr Tellis twice when she was suffering from fever. Both these time had a very good experience. He is very patient and his treatment & suggestion helped her recover very fast.
Excellent treatment. Very patient and experienced. Will not prescribe unnecessary medicine. Must go doctor for infants.

********* ********* **** ********
Minimanl medicine perscribe. 
Very much experience to handle toddler
Nice, appointment time was honored . It was nice interacting with Dr. Tellis, he diagnosed my son's problem (muscle spasm in neck) and next day my son was relieved of the pain. Thanks Dr !
Dr.Tellis is a very kind person when it comes to treating people.I prefer Dr.Tellis as a every day doctor because he is very patient and dedicated doctor.
My experience with Dr Tellis was good. He was able to diagnose quickly what was ailing my kid. He is also very good with kids.

Visited doctor for my 11 months child, got rashes on whole body and mouth.

Doctor has diagnosed it quickly and told it is because of food allergy and will take some time to go. Medication was provided on top of previous doctor diagnosis. We are yet to see results.
Dr. Tellis is an excellent doctor who prescribes safe and effective medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted doctor at night 10.15 through vedio call. His treatment helped my child, he had 103 fever and all the nearby clinics were closed. Doctor suggested medicines through which his temperature reduced. He was very helpful.
Doctor is very good. I visited him earlier too. He is courteous. I would recommend him. Good work doctor.
Dr Tellis explained properly about the UTI which my daughter suffered and thereafter the ear infection and dry skin
